title: Error when running rustdoc ... `--output-format json`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code N/A Error when running `rustup run nightly cargo rustdoc -p bevy:0.8.0-dev -- --output-format json -Zunstable-options` in crate with `bevy = { git = "https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy" }` as dependency ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.63.0-nightly (4cbaac699 2022-05-25) binary: rustc commit-hash: 4cbaac699c14b7ac7cc80e54823b2ef6afeb64af commit-date: 2022-05-25 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.63.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `Item { id: Id("26:3173"), crate_id: 26, name: Some("TypeRegistry"), span: Some(Span { filename: "/home/makspll/.cargo/git/checkouts/bevy-f66245b8e5deb629/3d68094/crates/bevy_reflect/src/type_registry.rs", begin: (21, 0), end: (23, 1) }), visibility: Public, docs: Some("A synchronized wrapper around a [`TypeRegistry`]."), links: {"`TypeRegistry`": Id("26:1145")}, attrs: [], deprecation: None, inner: Struct(Struct { struct_type: Plain, generics: Generics { params: [], where_predicates: [] }, fields_stripped: false, fields: [Id("26:3174")], impls: [] }) }`, right: `Item { id: Id("26:3173"), crate_id: 26, name: Some("TypeRegistryArc"), span: Some(Span { filename: "/home/makspll/.cargo/git/checkouts/bevy-f66245b8e5deb629/3d68094/crates/bevy_reflect/src/type_registry.rs", begin: (21, 0), end: (23, 1) }), visibility: Public, docs: Some("A synchronized wrapper around a [`TypeRegistry`]."), links: {"`TypeRegistry`": Id("26:1145")}, attrs: [], deprecation: None, inner: Struct(Struct { struct_type: Plain, generics: Generics { params: [], where_predicates: [] }, fields_stripped: false, fields: [Id("26:3174")], impls: [] }) }`', src/librustdoc/json/mod.rs:196:17 ```
Backtrace
